text: Marijke Ferguson (1 November 1927 â€“ 29 November 2024) was a Dutch musician and radio presenter. Furguson founded music ensemble that existed between 1965 and 2000. As a radio presenter Ferguson worked for 26 years for the Dtuch national Nederlandse Omroep Stichting (NOS), untill her retirement in 1993. Afterwards she worked for the (Radio Muziek-essay and Antiqua versus Nova). She taught for thirty years at the Conservatorium van Amsterdam. Ferguson died in on 29 November 2024, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:Dutch musicians Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Dutch radio personalities Category:Place of death missing
title: Marijke Ferguson
